thread.title: Re: Panic button = PUSHED: After Trump presser, Dem reps sound alarm for emergency nuke measure
thread.title_full: Re: Panic button = PUSHED: After Trump presser, Dem reps sound alarm for emergency nuke measure

author: Deplorable Nigel Pinchley
title: Re: Panic button = PUSHED: After Trump presser, Dem reps sound alarm for emergency nuke measure
text:
Panic button = PUSHED: Trump’s presser makes Dem reps sound alarm for emergency nuke measure Posted at 3:43 pm on February 16, 2017 by Doug P. Share on Facebook Share on Twitter 
A pair of Democrats have been undertaking an effort to curb President Trump’s ability to launch a nuclear strike . Today’s Trump press conference caused those Democrats, Rep. Ted Lieu and Rep. Ed Markey, try and speed things along: Scared yet? If so, support HR 669 from @SenMarkey & me. Bill puts restrictions on @POTUS to launch nuclear weapons. #TrumpPressConference https://t.co/9tyBHWbaxw 
— Ted Lieu (@tedlieu) February 16, 2017 “Nuclear holocaust would be like no other”– @realDonaldTrump 
Urgent: we must pass my no first-use nuclear weapons bill w/ @RepTedLieu . 
— Ed Markey (@SenMarkey) February 16, 2017 Trending
